name: cbvreuv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wreu(s0, c0, w0), wreu(s1, c0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wreu(s0, c0, w0), wreu(s1, c0, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wreu(s0, c0, w0), wreu(s1, c0, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

|- wb(wreu(s0, c0, w0), wreu(s1, c0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

|- wb(wreu(s0, c0, w0), wreu(s1, c0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Change the bound variable of a restricted unique existential quantifier using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
